content: this legal text summarizes a court case that occurred in pistoia on 11042012 the details of the case are not provided but it involves two parties the court has ruled on an application regarding the joint inheritance of two individuals lu ca and ca the court has dissolved the joint inheritance and determined that the legal heirs are entitled to equal shares of securities valued at €10562890 as of 2072009 the court has also specified the distribution of these shares among the heirs and ordered the parties to compensate the costs of the litigation the plaintiffs are claiming the inheritance of their deceased parents and sibling while the defendants are the children of one of the deceased siblings the court has reviewed the evidence determined the value of the assets and awarded specific amounts to each party the defendants request for additional evidence was rejected and they were ordered to pay the costs of the experts report the court has made a final ruling declaring the dissolution of the joint inheritance and determining the rights of the legal heirs each heir is entitled to €2112578 plus interest the court has also rejected the claims of the plaintiff and ordered the parties to bear the costs of the litigation this decision was made on march 12 2012
